parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the steering system can cause a loss of steering control, increasing the risk of a crash, and potentially leading to accidents or injuries.
symptoms: Loud knocking noises when making low-speed turns
vibrating or shaking when steering
difficulty steering
loud popping or clicking sounds
and loss of steering control.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Premature cracking of the Firestone Firehawk tires can lead to a blowout or loss of control, increasing the risk of accidents and putting the driver and other road users at risk.
symptoms: Deep cracking through the treads and into the sidewall
premature wear and tear
tire failure before reaching the expected mileage warranty.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The refusal of warranty replacement by the Firestone store can leave the driver with unsafe tires, putting themselves and others at risk, and may lead to additional costs for the driver to replace the tires.
symptoms: Firestone store refuses to honor the warranty
citing that the tires are discontinued or that cracking is a known issue
leaving the driver with no recourse for replacement.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the Electronic Power Steering (EPS) system can cause the steering wheel to become stiff or difficult to turn, making it challenging to control the vehicle, especially in emergency situations, which can increase the risk of accidents.
symptoms: The steering wheel feels stiff or difficult to turn
the vehicle is hard to steer
the steering wheel jerks or pulses
the vehicle hesitates or lags when accelerating
the power steering warning light illuminates on the dashboard.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the airbag to deploy in a crash can result in serious injury or death to the occupants, as it compromises the safety features designed to protect them.
symptoms: Airbags do not deploy in a crash
despite the severity of the impact warranting deployment.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Vehicle rollover can result in serious injury or death to the occupants, as well as damage to the vehicle.
symptoms: Vehicle flips over
loss of control
unexpected movement or rotation of the vehicle.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the right axle can cause the driver to lose control of the vehicle, leading to accidents, injuries, and even fatalities.
symptoms: The vehicle pulls to one side
the vehicle vibrates or shakes
the vehicle makes a loud noise
the vehicle loses power
the vehicle is difficult to steer
the vehicle is involved in an accident.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the steering system can cause the driver to lose control of the vehicle, leading to accidents, injuries, and even fatalities.
symptoms: The vehicle pulls to one side
the vehicle vibrates or shakes
the vehicle makes a loud noise
the vehicle loses power
the vehicle is difficult to steer
the vehicle is involved in an accident.
